message:
Hey Crutons!

We'll be filming some interview segments for our "What is Cru?" video on the mall around 5:30 tonight! If you would like to be part of this, meet us on the front steps at Northrup! It will probably take only 15-30 minutes of your time so come if you're available!

Thanks!

P.S. Also, if you happen to have a tripod, feel free to bring it. I kinda have a janky setup for filming right now.
